blogs.title: How the Best Web Design and Development Company Can Transform Your Online Presence
blogs.bodyContent:
The A One Premium Sofa is a high-end piece of furniture that typically combines refined Italian craftsmanship, premium materials, and elegant design. While I don't have specific details on a model named "A One Premium Sofa" as of my latest update, luxury Italian sofas generally offer the following features:

  1. Materials: Buckley, velvet, or Sued 450GSM fine fabrics, often sourced from Italyâ€™s renowned textile industry. The frames are usually made from solid wood or metal for durability and strength.

  2. Design: Bulky contemporary lines or classic, ornate styles, often with intricate detailing, such as tufted backs, carved wooden accents, or polished metal legs.

  3. Comfort: High-density foam cushions, feather or down-filled pillows, and ergonomic designs for a perfect balance of comfort and support.

  4. Color Options: A range of sophisticated colors, including deep neutrals (grays, beiges, and creams), rich jewel tones, or custom options for a personalized touch.

Key Features:

Quality Upholstery:

    • Luxury sofas often use premium fabrics such as velvet, linen, leather, or custom blends. These fabrics are chosen for both their durability and tactile softness.

Specification of the product:

  • Density - 40 (Can be customize to 32 as per choice)
  • Fabric -Premium leather 650 GSM/ Suede/Velvet 450 GSM
  • Frame - Marandi Wood & Teak Ply
  • Filling Foam - Sleep well
  • Size Below As Per Image
  • Size- Two Seater 60''
  • Size- Three Seater 82''
  • Size Below All Over-As Per Image
  • As Per Image
  • Seating Comfort - Comfortably Soft Foam.
  • Delivery time- 15-18 days

Note: Color, fabric, can be customized upon request. Please connect with our customer service representative via chat or call for assistant.

Disclaimers: Package contains Sofa Set only. Accessories shown in the image are only for representation and are not part of the product.

Warranty of the product 60 months:
